Commentary.ab: Y10.17a nəmō haōmāi mazdaδātāi vaŋhuš haōmō mazdaδātō nəmō haōmāi] Pirart del.
Y10.17b upa.staōmi] Kellens, Pirart (Bartholomae); Geldner upastaomi.
Y10.17b yat̰cit̰ ... yat̰cit̰ ... yaēcit̰] Geldner; Kellens yat̰cit̰ ... yat̰cit̰ ... yat̰cit̰; Pirart yaēcit̰ ... yaēcit̰ ... yaēcit̰.
Y10.17b upa dərəzāhu] Kellens (Bartholomae); Geldner upadarəzāhu; Pirart upa dərəzrāhu.
Y10.17d zəmi] Bartholomae zəme, but vid. Kellens, 1974 p. 397.
Y10.17d raēuuatō] mss. 15, 677; Geldner, Kellens, Pirart raēuuaṇtō, but Kellens, 2007 p. 82 " *raēuuatō était attendu"; Pirart, 2004 p.104, n. 319 "(raēuuaṇtō) mis pour le génitif".

Parallels.ab: āat̰ aōxta zaraϑuštrō nəmō haōmāi mazdaδātāi vaŋhuš haōmō mazdaδātō nəmō haōmāi = Y11.8.
āat̰ aōxta zaraϑuštrō nəmō haōmāi mazdaδātāi vaŋhuš haōmō ~ Y9.16 āat̰ aōxta zaraϑuštrō nəmō haōmāi vaŋhuš haōmō
āat̰ aōxta zaraϑuštrō nəmō haōmāi = Y9.3.
vīspe haōma upa.staōmi ~ Y10.21 vīspe haōma yazamaide.
yat̰cit̰ baršnušuua gairinąm yat̰cit̰ jąfnušuua raōnąm ~ VS2.23 yat̰ca aŋhat̰ barəšnuš paiti gairinąm yat̰ca jafnušuua raōnąm.
baršnušuua gairinąm ~ Y9.26, Y10.3 baršnuš paiti gairinąm; ~ VS5.1 haca barəšnauuō gairinąm; ~ VS5.1, VS5.2 auui barəšnauuō gairinąm; ~ Yt14.21 barəšnauuō ... gairinąm; ~ Yt18.6 barəšnauuō gairinąm.
